content: a fun quick knit pattern perfect for cool nights in late spring or summer this large shawl also makes a very trendy oversized kerchief worked in 3 colors of cascade pima cotton the possibilities are endless and the yarn itself keeps the cost in the realm of reality **materials ** 3 skeins of cascade ultra pima 220yds each **yarn weight note ** cascade lists this as a light fingering it s not it s almost exactly the same as malabrigo arroyo in thickness so sport/dk size 9 24 & 40 circular needles gauge 4 sts to 1 in garter size 51 x 46 or thereabouts
